sentences.en: A high seating position makes ingress and egress easy.
sentences.cn: 较高的座椅位置使入口和出口容易.

sentences.en: Fire escape Means of rapid egress from a Building, primarily intended for use in of fire.
sentences.cn: 太平梯:主要用于大楼发生火灾时将人员迅速撤离险境的安全出口设施.

sentences.en: I guessed, by his preparations, that egress was allowed, and, leaving my hard couch , made a movement to follow him.
sentences.cn: 看他作的准备, 我猜他允许我走了, 我离开我的硬座, 打算跟他走.

sentences.en: LSR and egress LER receive and transmit labeled packets, executing ILM ( incoming Label Map ) forwarder.
sentences.cn: 标记交换路由器(LSR ) 和出口LER接收 、传送标记包, 执行ILM ( 入口标记映射)转发.

sentences.en: Means of rapid egress from a Building, primarily intended for use in case of fire.
sentences.cn: 主要用于大楼发生火灾时将人员迅速撤离险境的安全出口设施.

sentences.en: Prevents egress of the latter through the unsealed portion.
sentences.cn: 阻止后者通过未接合部分出来.

sentences.en: Safe access and egress can be achieved by various methods.
sentences.cn: 可以采用各种方法安全的进入或离开。

sentences.en: So assuming he's anticipated the fastest egress, it's the east terrace.
sentences.cn: 所以假设他预计的是最快出口那么他在东部平台.

sentences.en: The secured area should meet all life safety code egress requirements.
sentences.cn: 受保护区域要满足所有的生命安全法规对出口的要求.

sentences.en: These frequently egress the work professional public figure's best choice.
sentences.cn: 那些经常外出办公的职业人士的最佳选择.

sentences.en: Traditionally, the physical infrastructure providers control the underlying hardware; they provide the cloud tenant with egress and ingress at the most fundamental level.
sentences.cn: 传统上，物理设备供应商控制底层硬件； 它们提供给租户基础层上的出口和入口；

trans.tran_en: the act of leaving a building or place, or the right to do this
